mission_need: The organization requires scalable, secure, and cost-effective data storage to support business growth and regulatory compliance over the next decade.
requirements: Store at least 10 PB, scalable to 20 PB
Total cost of ownership not to exceed $20M over 10 years

alternatives.name: Upgrade Existing Storage
alternatives.description: Expand current on-premises storage infrastructure with new hardware and software.

alternatives.name: Build New Onsite Data Center
alternatives.description: Construct a new facility dedicated to data storage with modern equipment.

alternatives.name: Adopt Commercial Cloud Storage
alternatives.description: Migrate all storage needs to a commercial cloud provider (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP).

constraints: Must comply with organizational cybersecurity policies
Implementation must not disrupt ongoing operations
